name: Awol Apparatus
description:
We created this game for the Boss Rush Jam 2023. The theme of this jam was "makeshift" applied to a boss rush type of game. This is a learning project and there are a LOT of bugs and unfinished features. 

You're an inventor but one of your inventions has started to attack you. Quickly find components around the lab to assemble a weapon and take it down.

===================================

Instructions

The idea was that you need to pick up parts around the room to makeshift a weapon. Different recipes give you different weapons. The game is over once you destroy the giant robot in the room. The metal balls he shoots out damage the player. (We didn't finish making this all though!)

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Button - Hold to fire weapon

Space - Jump

TAB - Pause

Weapon Recipes

Pipe, Pipe, Bolt = Pistol

Bolt, Bolt, Pipe = Sword

Pipe, Pipe, Gear = Bomb
